attributes.action: Give tom moore who is 99 a knighthood for the money he raised
attributes.additional_details: Because he is a army veteran he is 99 yesrs old and he has raised milloons, he has served this country give him something back!
attributes.background: Give 5his army veteran whi 99 years old a knighthood for the money he raised for ngs in these trying times.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
